answers.answer: Hi.How long have you had these symptoms? What scans have already been done? Were there any blood work done?Your symptoms are non-specific and can be associated with many types of conditions including nerve compression or impingement, multiple sclerosis, vitamin and mineral deficiencies, diabetes, thyroid disorder, etc.Are any of the doctors you consulted a neurologist? If not, it would be advisable to consult one to assess for any neurologic cause to your symptoms.Good luck.

question: ive had numbness tingling on the left side of my face and and and forehead also my left arm and sole of my foot seem to have a weakness ive seen 3 doctors and had scans and still no one can find anything wrong WHAT COULD IT BE
title: neurology
